fields.Text:
ᎤᎯᏐᏛ {{c1::ᎤᏁᎳᏓ.}}
u:hi:sohdv̋ {{c1::ù:hne̋:lada}}
fields.English: It was lonesome when she left.

fields.Text:
ᎫᎫ ᎤᏲᏨ {{c1::ᎤᏬᎰᏌ.}}
gù:gu ù:yô:jv́ {{c1::ù:wő:hosa}}
fields.English: The bottle broke when it dropped.

fields.Text:
{{c1::ᏱᏚᏏᏛᏂᎳ‚}} ᎤᏬᏰᏂ ᎤᏪᎯᏍᏓᏁᎰᎢ.
{{c1::yidu:síhtv̋:nì:la}} uwò:ye̋:ni ù:we:hisdâ:ne:hó:’i
fields.English: When he applauds‚ his hand hurts.

fields.Text:
ᎤᏞᏨ {{c1::ᎠᏥᎶᏄᎡᏝ.}}
ù:dlé:jv́ {{c1::à:jilo:nu’e̋:hla}}
fields.English: He took revenge when he was cheated.

fields.Text:
ᎪᎩ {{c1::ᏱᏄᎵᏍᏔᎾ}} ᎠᎦᎾᏬᏍᎪᎢ.
go:gi {{c1::yinű:lstana}} à:ga:nawo:sgó:’i
fields.English: When it becomes summer‚ it gets warm.

fields.Text:
ᎠᎧᏍᎨᏂ ᎤᏪᎯᏍᏓᏁᎸ {{c1::ᎤᏅᏣ.}}
akasge̋:ni ù:wehisdâ:ně:lv́: {{c1::u:nv̋:ja}}
fields.English: He hurt his hip when he fell.

fields.Text:
ᏓᏍᎩᎾᏗᏍᎪ ᎪᎱᏍᏗ {{c1::ᏳᎿᎸᏍᏔᎾ.}}
dà:sgi:nâ:di:sgó go:hű:sdi {{c1::yu:hná:lv̋:stana}}
fields.English: He curses when something makes him angry.

fields.Text:
ᏗᎧᏃᎩᏍᏗ ᏓᏅᏗᏍᎪ {{c1::ᏱᏚᏂᏃᎩᏌ.}}
dikano:gi̋:sdi dà:nhdǐ:sgô {{c1::yidu:ní:hno:gi̋:sa}}
fields.English: They use musical instruments when they sing.

fields.Text:
ᎠᎯᏓ ᎤᎶᏒ {{c1::ᎠᏥᎪᎵᏰᎠ.}}
ahi̋:da ù:lo:sv́ {{c1::à:jigo:lǐ:ye̋:}}
fields.English: He passed easily when he was tested.

fields.Text:
ᏍᏆᏞᏍᏗ ᎤᏂᏲᎱᏎᎸ {{c1::ᎤᏬᏍᏛᏂᎳ.}}
sgwà:hle̋:sdi ù:ni:yo:hu:sé:lv́ {{c1::uwò:sdv̋:nì:la}}
fields.English: They lost the ball when he batted.

fields.Text:
ᎧᏃᎨᏂ ᎤᎵᏍᏆᎵᏎᎸ {{c1::ᎤᏅᏣ.}}
kano:ge̋:ni u:lsgwâ:lsě:lv́ {{c1::u:nv̋:ja}}
fields.English: He broke his arm when he fell.

fields.Text:
ᏩᏯ {{c1::ᏱᏚᏂᏲᏏ}} ᎠᏂᎾᏰᎪᎢ.
wahya {{c1::yidu:ní:yo:si̋:}} à:ni:nayé:gó:’i
fields.English: Wolves are dangerous when they’re hungry.

fields.Text:
{{c1::ᎤᏍᏆᏓ}} ᎪᏪᎵ ᏕᎪᏪᎵᏍᎬ‚ ᎤᏓᏯᏍᏔᏅᎢ.
{{c1::ù:sgwá’da}} go:hwe:li de:gó:hwě:lî:sgv̋: ù:da:hyâ:stanv̌:’i
fields.English: When he finished writing letters‚ he stretched.

fields.Text:
ᎠᏓᏅᏙ {{c1::ᏳᎴᏫᏍᏔᎾ}} ᎠᏲᎱᏍᎪ ᏴᏫ.
ada:nhdo {{c1::yu:le̋:hwistana}} à:yo:hu:sgó yv:wi
fields.English: When the heart stops‚ a person dies.

fields.Text:
ᏓᏆᎴᎳ {{c1::ᏚᏟᏆᏗᎾ}} ᎠᎪᎲᏍᎬ ᎤᏓᎴᏅᎲᎢ.
dagwalé:la {{c1::dù:hlihgwadi̋:na}} à:góhvsgv̋: ù:dale:nv:hv̌:’i
fields.English: When the car overturned it started burning.

fields.Text:
ᎠᏂᏴᏫᏯ {{c1::ᎠᎾᏴᎴᎬ}} ᎠᎱᎵ ᎠᏅᏗᏍᎪᎢ.
ani:yv:wiya̋: {{c1::à:na:hyv̌:lê:gv̋:}} ahu:li à:nhdi:sgó:’i
fields.English: Indians use a drum when they chant.

fields.Text:
ᏗᎩᏳᏍᎨᏂ ᏗᎦᏓᎭ ᏂᏚᎵᏍᏔᏅ {{c1::ᎤᏓᎾᏏᏅᏌ.}}
di:kiyu:sge̋:ni di:ga:da:ha̋: nidù:lstanv́ {{c1::u:dansí:nv̋:sa}}
fields.English: His elbows got dirty when he crawled.

fields.Text:
ᏍᏓᏯ {{c1::ᏱᎦᏬᏂᏌ}} ᎩᎳ ᎠᏛᎩᏍᎪᎢ.
sda̋:ya {{c1::yigawó:ni̋:sa}} kilá à:tv:gî:sgó:’i
fields.English: He hears only when you speak loud.

fields.Text:
ᎤᏒ {{c1::ᏱᏄᎵᏍᏔᎾ}} ᎩᏟ ᏓᏑᏫᏍᎪᎢ.
usv̋: {{c1::yinű:lstana}} gi:hli dà:su:hwisgó:’i
fields.English: When it becomes light‚ the dog barks.

fields.Text:
{{c1::ᏳᏁᏍᏓᎳᏓ}} ᏕᎦᏅᏅ ᏓᏫᏍᎬᎯ ᏂᏕᎦᎵᏍᏗᏍᎪᎢ.
{{c1::yu:ne̋:sdalada}} degánv:hnv́: dawi:sgv̋:hi nide:gálsdǐ:sgó:’i
fields.English: When it freezes‚ the roads get slippery.

fields.Text:
ᎤᎾᎵᎪᏒ {{c1::ᎤᎾᏓᏠᏌ‚}} ᎤᏁᏡᏅ ᎠᎾᎳᏍᎦᎵᏍᎩ.
u:nalí:go:sv̋: {{c1::u:nada:hlő:sa}} ù:ne:hluhnv́ analà:sgali̋:sgi
fields.English: When their team won‚ the ballplayers yelled.

fields.Text:
{{c1::ᏳᎦᎿᎾ‚}} ᏝᏬᏚᎯ ᏂᏕᎦᎵᏍᏗᏍᎪ ᏕᎦᏅᏅᎢ.
{{c1::yǔ:ga̋:hnana}} hlawò:tű:hi nidegálsdǐ:sgó de:gánv:hnv̋:’i
fields.English: When it rains‚ the roads get muddy.

fields.Text:
ᏧᎦᎾᏮ ᏗᏜ ᏓᏄᎪᏗᏍᎪ ᏌᏌ ᎪᎳ {{c1::ᏱᏄᎵᏍᏔᎾ.}}
ju:gá:nawv̋ dí:dla dà:nukdi:sgô: sa:sa gő:la {{c1::yinű:lstana}}
fields.English: Geese head south when winter comes.

fields.Text:
ᏥᎾᏬᎪ {{c1::ᏳᏴᏜ}} ᏙᏱ.
jì:nawó:gó {{c1::yúhyv̋:dla}} dǒ:yi
fields.English: I get cold when it’s cold outside.

fields.Text:
ᎪᏍᏚᎭ ᏄᎵᏍᏔᏅ ᎤᏑᎸ {{c1::ᎤᏅᏣ.}}
ko:sdù:ha̋ nù:lstanv́ ù:su:lv̋ {{c1::ù:nv̋:ja}}
fields.English: His pants became dusty when he fell.

fields.Text:
ᎠᏆᏕᏘᏗ ᎠᎩᎸᏉᏗ {{c1::ᏱᎦᏓᏬᎠ.}}
agwade:tdi̋: agilv:kwdi {{c1::yigadáwő:’a}}
fields.English: I like to dive when I’m swimming.

fields.Text:
ᏦᎳᏂ {{c1::ᏓᎦᏍᏚᎿ}} ᏥᎠᏬᏍᏔᏅᎢ.
jő:lani {{c1::dà:ksdû:hna}} ji’awó:stanv̌:’i
fields.English: When I closed the windows‚ I smothered it.

fields.Text:
ᏩᎦ {{c1::ᏱᏚᎪᎭ}} ᏓᎨᎮᎪᎢ.
wahga {{c1::yidú:gő:ha}} dà:ke:hê:gó:’i
fields.English: When the dog sees cows‚ he chases them.

fields.Text:
ᎦᎵᏦᏕ ᎠᎩᏴᏢ {{c1::ᎤᎦᎿᏂᏝ.}}
galhjo:dé à:giyv:hlv́ {{c1::ù:ga:hnani̋:hla}}
fields.English: I entered the house when the rain came.

fields.Text:
ᏍᏚᏗ ᏚᎸᏛᏂᏍᏔᏅ {{c1::ᎤᏅᎪᏣ.}}
sdù:di dù:lv:dv:nî:stanv́ {{c1::ù:nv:gő:ja}}
fields.English: He slammed the door when he went out.

fields.Text:
ᏚᏯᏪᎪᏍ {{c1::ᏱᎤᎷᏣ}} ᏧᎸᏫᏍᏓᏁᎵᏙᎸ?
dù:yawé:gó’is {{c1::yi’ű:luhja}} jù:lv:hwísdà:ně:lî:dò:lv̋
fields.English: Is he tired when he returns from work?

fields.Text:
ᏝᏬᏚᎯ ᎤᏅᏨ {{c1::ᏚᎿᏒᏝ.}}
hlawò:tuhi̋ ù:nv́:jv́ {{c1::dù:hnâ:sv̋:tla}}
fields.English: She fell in the mud when she slipped.

fields.Text:
ᎠᏙᎳᏅᏍᏗ ᎬᏗᏍᎪ {{c1::ᏯᏇᏙᎳ.}}
adolnv̋:sdi gv̀:dǐ:sgó {{c1::yagwé:dő:la}}
fields.English: I use a cane when I walk around.

fields.Text:
ᏧᎦᏃᏮ ᎾᎾᏛᎾᏗᏍᎪ ᏌᏌ ᎪᎳ {{c1::ᏱᏄᎵᏍᏔᎾ.}}
ju:gá:nawv̋: nà:nadv́:nhdi:sgó sa:sa gő:la {{c1::yinű:lstana}}
fields.English: Geese head south when it turns winter.

fields.Text:
ᏒᎩ {{c1::ᏱᏚᏁᎦᎸᎭ}} ᎤᏠᏱᏍᏗᏍᎪᎢ.
sv̀:gi {{c1::yidu:nê:galv̋:ha}} u:dlo:ysdi:sgó:’i
fields.English: When she peels onions‚ it makes her cry.

fields.Text:
ᎤᏙᏓᏆᏓ ᎦᏃᎭᎵᏙᎰ {{c1::ᏳᏃᎭᎴᎾ.}}
u:dő:dagwada gano:halǐ:dô:hó: {{c1::yu:nó:hale̋:na}}
fields.English: He hunts all day when he goes hunting.

fields.Text:
ᎪᏍᏗ {{c1::ᏱᎪᏎᎳ}} ᎠᏤᏥᏍᏗᏍᎪᎢ.
go:hű:sdi {{c1::yigó:se̋:la}} à:je:tsdi:sgó:’i
fields.English: When you say something to him‚ he grins.

fields.Text:
ᎩᎶ ᎤᏯᏂᏍᎬ {{c1::ᎤᏛᎦᎾ‚}} ᎤᎴᏫᏍᏔᏅᎢ.
kilő: ù:hyaní:sgv̋: {{c1::ù:tv̋:gà:na}} ù:le:hwistánv́:’i
fields.English: When he heard someone calling him‚ he stopped.

fields.Text:
{{c1::ᏳᏓᏬᎡᎾ}} ᎠᎵᏰᏑᏍᏘᎩᏍᎪᎢ.
{{c1::yu:dáwo:’e̋:na}} à:liyé:su:stigí:sgó:’i
fields.English: When he goes swimming‚ he takes his ring off.

fields.Text:
ᏗᏍᎬᏓᎨᏂ ᏚᏍᎪᎵᏰᎥ {{c1::ᎤᎴᏫᏍᏔᎾ}} ᎠᏗᏟᏒᎢ.
di:sgv:dage̋:ni dù:sgo:lǐ:yé’v́ {{c1::ù:le̋:hwistana}} à:tlí:sv̋:’i
fields.English: He rubbed his shins when he stopped running.

fields.Text:
ᏗᎾᎦᎵᏍᎩ ᏧᏯᏅ ᏚᎦᏒᏍᏔᏅ {{c1::ᏚᏖᏴᏌ.}}
di:nà:galǐ:sgi juyà:nv̋ du:ksv:stánv́ {{c1::dù:té:yv̋:sa}}
fields.English: The electrical wires smoked when they became hot.

fields.Text:
ᏗᎦᏚᎵᏓ {{c1::ᏂᏚᎵᏍᏔᎾ}} ᏗᏓᏟᎶᏍᏔᏅ ᏚᏲᏨᎢ.
di:ga:dú:li̋:da {{c1::nidù:lstána}} di:da:hli:lò:stanv̋ dù:yó:jv̌:’i
fields.English: When the photos got wet‚ they were ruined.

fields.Text:
ᏍᏓᏯ {{c1::ᎤᏃᎸᎾ‚}} ᏡᎬ ᎤᎴᏴᏒᎢ.
sda̋:ya {{c1::u:no:lv̋:na}} dluhgv̋ u:le:yv:sv́:’i
fields.English: When the wind blew hard‚ the tree fell.

fields.Text:
ᏗᏣᎴᎲᎦ {{c1::ᎦᏛᏅ}} ᏂᎦᏓ ᏕᏣᎴᏅᎢ.
dì:jalé:hv:ga {{c1::gadv̀:nv̋}} niga̋:da dé:jale:hnv:’i
fields.English: When I say stand up‚ everyone stand up.

fields.Text:
ᎢᎾ {{c1::ᏱᏚᎯᎴᎾ}} ᏩᎦ ᎯᎸᏍᎩ ᎢᏳᏩᎩᏗ ᏕᎦᏪᏐᎸᏍᏗᏍᎪᎢ.
i̋:na {{c1::yidu:hí’le̋:na}} wahga hilv̋:sgi iyuwa̋:kdi de:gáwe:so:lv:sdǐ:sgó:’i
fields.English: When he drives cattle for a long distance‚ he rests them a few times.

fields.Text:
ᏩᏯ {{c1::ᏱᏚᏛᎦᎾ}} ᎩᏟ ᎨᏡᎲᏍᎪᎢ.
wahya {{c1::yidú:tv̋:gà:na}} gi:hli ge:hluhv́sgó:’i
fields.English: The dog howls when he hears the wolves.

fields.Text:
ᏅᏲᎯ {{c1::ᏱᏓᏍᎪᏍᎦ}} ᎨᏘᎶᏍᏗ ᎬᏗᏍᎪᎢ.
nv̀:yő:hi {{c1::yidásgő:sga}} ge:ti:lő:sdi kdi:sgó’i
fields.English: When he digs holes in a rocky place‚ he uses a crowbar.

fields.Text:
ᏍᏆᏞᏍᏗ {{c1::ᎤᏩᏂᎳ}} ᎧᏴᏐᎵ ᎩᎦ ᏚᏴᏍᏉᎸᎢ.
sgwà:hle̋:sdi {{c1::uwa̋:hnila}} kayvső:li gǐ:ga dù:hyv:sgwó:lv̌:’i
fields.English: When a ball hit him on his nose‚ he got a nosebleed.

fields.Text:
ᎠᏢᏈᏍᎬᏊ ᎢᎦ ᎨᏐ {{c1::ᏳᏬᏂᏌ.}}
à:dlv̌:kwsgv̋:gwu i:ga̋ gè:só {{c1::yǔ:wô:ni̋:sa}}
fields.English: All he does is just brag when he speaks.

fields.Text:
ᎪᎯᏁᎪ ᎤᏪᏥ ᎠᏧᏣ ᎠᎹᏱ {{c1::ᏱᏚᏂᏐᏣ.}}
go:hǐ:nê:gó: uwě:ji achű:ja amǎ:yi {{c1::yidu:ni̋:sohja}}
fields.English: He holds his son’s hand when they cross the water.

fields.Text:
ᎦᏙ ᎤᏍᏗ ᎯᏰᏌᏛ ᎲᏗᏍᎪ {{c1::ᏱᏦᏣᏁᏌ?}}
gado ű:sdi hi:yè:sá’dv̋ hvhdǐ:sgó: {{c1::yijo:jane̋:sa}}
fields.English: Which finger do you use when you pull the trigger?

fields.Text:
ᎠᏥᎳ ᎤᏥᎦᏘ ᎬᏗ {{c1::ᎠᎩᏢᎭ}} ᎦᎷᏯᏍᏗ‚ ᎪᏍᏓᏯ ᏄᎵᏍᏔᏅᎢ.
ajǐ:la ű:tsgati gv̋hdi {{c1::à:kdlv:ha}} galùysdi gő:sdà:ya nù:lstánv́’i
fields.English: When I sharpened the axe with a file‚ it became sharp.

fields.Text:
{{c1::ᎤᏂᎩᏌ}} ᏓᏆᎴᎳ ᎤᏭᏓᎴᏒ ᎤᎾᏓᏕᏒᏓ.
{{c1::ù:hnígi̋:sa}} dagwalé:la ù:wu:dalé:sé: u:nada:dè:sv̋:da
fields.English: He unhooked the chain when the car started.

fields.Text:
{{c1::ᏱᏚᏯᎨᏗᏐᎿ}} ᏄᎾ‚ ᎠᎼᎯ ᏕᎫᎯᎶᏍᎪᎢ.
{{c1::yidu:hyáhke̋:tsohnâ}} nǔ:nâ amő:hi de:gú:hi:ló:sgó:’i
fields.English: When she finishes peeling potatoes‚ she washes them in water.

fields.Text:
ᎦᎵᏦᏕ ᎦᎵᏦᏛ ᎬᎫᏍᎪ {{c1::ᏳᎦᎿᎾ.}}
gahljǒ:dé galhjo:tv̋ gv:gû:sgó: {{c1::yù:ga̋:hnana}}
fields.English: The roof on the house leaks when it rains.

fields.Text:
ᎤᏬᏚᎯ ᎠᏓᏠᏍᏗ ᎤᏓᏠᏢᎢ ᏗᎦᏚᎲ {{c1::ᎤᏪᎾ.}}
uwo:dű:hi adà:dlǒ:sdi ù:dá:dlo:hlv̌:’i diga:dú:hv̋ {{c1::ù:we̋:na}}
fields.English: She put on a pretty belt when she went to town.

fields.Text:
ᎠᎦᎵᏍᎬ {{c1::ᎤᏩᎾᏬᏔᎾ}} ᎤᏅᏥ‚ ᏝᏬᏚᎯ ᏄᎵᏍᏔᏅᎢ.
à:ga:lí:sgv̋: {{c1::ù:wa:nawohtana}} u:nhji hlawò:tű:hi nù:lstanv̌:’i
fields.English: When the sunshine melted the snow‚ it became muddy.

fields.Text:
ᎬᎾᏬᏍᎩ ᎪᏢᏔᏅ ᎤᎸᏌᏗ ᎤᏩᎾᏬᏒ ᎤᏗᏞᎩ ᎠᎹ ᎠᏟᏍᏛ {{c1::ᏭᏝᎾ.}}
gv:nawő:sgi gohlvhtanv̋: ulv̋:sa’di uwa:nawo:sv́: u:di̋:hlehgi ama à:dlî:sdv̋ {{c1::wű:hlana}}
fields.English: A glass made of plastic melted when she put in some hot water.

fields.Text:
ᎦᏙᎯ {{c1::ᏱᏚᎾᏁᎶᎿ}} ᏗᏂᏲᏟ‚ ᎠᏂᎦᏓᎭ ᎾᎾᎵᏍᏗᏍᎪᎢ.
ga:dő:hi {{c1::yidu:nâ:ne:lő:hna}} di:ni:yő:hli ani:ga:da:ha̋ nà:nalsdi:sgó:’i
fields.English: When children play on the ground‚ they become dirty.

fields.Text:
{{c1::ᏫᏓᏂᏰᎵᏍᎬᎢ}} ᎢᎪᎯᏓ ᏩᏇᏙᎸᎢ.
{{c1::widaní:yelì:sgv̋:’i}} igó:hi̋:da wà:gwě:dô:lv̌:’i
fields.English: I stayed there until they adjourned.

fields.Text:
ᎢᎾᎨ ᏮᎤᎶᏒ ᏢᏓᏥ {{c1::ᎤᎵᏘᏌ.}}
ǐ:náge̋: wv́’u:lo:sv́ hlv:dají {{c1::ù:lti̋:sa}}
fields.English: The lion went back into the wilderness when it escaped.

fields.Text:
ᎧᏁᎩᏍ {{c1::ᏥᏯᎵᏃᎮᏗᏍᎬ‚}} ᏝᎨ?
kane̋:gís {{c1::chi:yali:no:he:hdí:sgv̋:}} hláke
fields.English: Did he answer when you were speaking to him‚ or not?

fields.Text:
ᎤᏁᏉᎥ ᏧᎸᏫᏍᏓᏁᏗ {{c1::ᎤᏍᏆᏓ}} ᏓᏕᏠᏆᏍᎬᎢ.
ù:hnehgwó:’v́ ju:lv:hwisdà:nehdi̋: {{c1::ù:sgwá’da}} dà:de:hlohgwâ:sgv̋:’i
fields.English: He increased his work load when he finished school.

fields.Text:
ᏥᏚᎬ ᎢᎦ ᏓᏥᏂᏝᏂ {{c1::ᏥᎪᎥᎢ.}}
jì:tú:gv̋: i:ga̋: dajî:nihlani {{c1::ji:go’v̋:’i}}
fields.English: I’m going to collect from him what he owes me when I see him.

fields.Text:
{{c1::ᏚᎪᏃᎿ}} ᎠᏓ ᎤᏮᏠᏒ ᎪᏛᎢ.
{{c1::dù:góhnohna}} ada ùwhdlǒ:sv́ go:tv̋:’i
fields.English: When the wood burned up‚ the fire went out.

fields.Text:
{{c1::ᎠᏥᏐᏅᎿ}} ᎩᎳᏊ ᎢᏴᏓ ᎤᎷᏨ ᎦᎾᎦᏘ.
{{c1::à:ji:so:nv̋:hna}} kilagwu iyv̋:da ù:lúhjv́ gánakti
fields.English: When he was wounded‚ a doctor was there immediately.

fields.Text:
ᏡᎬ ᎤᏍᎪᎵ {{c1::ᏭᎶᏢ}} ᏌᎶᎵ ᎩᏟ ᎤᎨᎮᎾ.
dluhgv̋: u:skő:li {{c1::wù:lô:hlv́}} salǒ:li gi:hli ù:ke:he̋:na
fields.English: The squirrel climbed to the top of the tree when the dog chased it.

fields.Text:
ᎦᏂᏢ ᎠᏰᏍᏛᏗ {{c1::ᎤᎴᏌ}} ᏗᎧᏲᏗᏍᎩᎢ ᎤᏮᏣᎬᏅᎢ.
gani:hlv̋ ayě:sdv̋:di {{c1::ù:le̋:sa}} dikayohdì:sgi̋:’i ùwhjagv́:nv̌:’i
fields.English: When she took the sheet out of the dryer‚ she shook it.

fields.Text:
ᎠᏕᎳ {{c1::ᎤᎪᎭ}} ᎦᏙᎯ ᎠᎲ ᎤᎩᏒᎢ.
adě:la {{c1::ù:gő:ha}} gǎ:dő:hi à:hv̋: ù:gí:sv̌:’i
fields.English: When he saw money on the ground‚ he picked it up.

fields.Text:
ᎠᎩᏃᎭᎵᏙᎸ {{c1::ᎢᎠᎩᎷᏣ}} ᎠᏋᏙᏌᏛᎢ ᎦᎶᏇ.
a:gino:hali:do:lv̋: {{c1::í’agíluhja}} à:kwto:sá’dv̌:’i galò:gwe
fields.English: When I returned from hunting‚ I hung up my gun.

fields.Text:
ᏕᎦᎳᏅᏛ {{c1::ᏱᏚᏁᏍᏓᎳᏓ}} ᏃᏯ ᎠᏂᎳᎨᏯᏛᏍᎪᎢ ᏅᏃᎯ ᏧᏂᎸᏫᏍᏓᏁᎯ.
degalanvdv {{c1::yidunesdalada}} noya anilageydvsgo’i nvnohi junilvhwisdanehi
fields.English: When the streets freeze over‚ the road maintenance crews dump sand on them.

fields.Text:
ᏌᎵᎫᎩ ᏥᏰᏒ ᎥᏓᎵ {{c1::ᎦᏑᎲᏍᎬᎢ.}}
saligú:gi ji:yè:sv́ v:dalí {{c1::gà:suhv́sgv̋:’i}}
fields.English: I hooked a snapping turtle while I was fishing at the pond.

fields.Text:
ᏍᏆᏂᏤᏍᏛ ᏭᏪᏙᎸ ᏙᎢ {{c1::ᎡᏙᎲ}} ᎢᎪᎯᏓ.
sgwǎ:njè:sdv̋ wù:wě:dô:lv́ to:hi̋ {{c1::e:dô:hv̋}} igó:hi̋:da
fields.English: He went to New Mexico while on his vacation.

fields.Text:
ᏍᎪᏂᏱᏍ ᏫᏤᏓᏍᏗ ᏄᎵᏍᏔᏁ ᎠᏂᏲᏍᎩ {{c1::ᏥᏯᎥᎢ?}}
skwani:yi̋s wije̋:dà:sdi nù:ltanê: ani:yósgi̋: {{c1::chi:yá’v̋:’i}}
fields.English: Did you have to go overseas when you were in the service?

fields.Text:
ᏑᎨᏓ {{c1::ᎤᏬᏢᏃᎿ‚}} ᏗᎦᏘᏗ ᏭᏝᏅᎢ.
su:gé:da {{c1::uwo:hlv̋:hnohna}} digà:tdi̋: wù:tlanv́:’i
fields.English: After she made the dough‚ she put it in the oven.

fields.Text:
ᏒᏙᏂ ᎤᎧᎵᏨ ᎤᎦᎿᏅ ᎠᎹ {{c1::ᎤᎦᎿᎾ.}}
sv:dǒ:ni u:kalî:jv́ u:ga:hnanv̋: ama {{c1::u:ga̋:hnana}}
fields.English: The barrel filled up with rainwater when it rained.

fields.Text:
Ꮩ ᏂᏣᏛᎦ {{c1::ᏚᏬᏎᎳ‚}} ᎡᏝᏪ ᏄᎾᎵᏍᏔᏅᎢ.
tő nì:jadv̂:ga {{c1::dù:wò:se̋:la}} e:hláwe̋: nù:nálistanv́:’i
fields.English: When he told them to be still‚ they became quiet.

fields.Text:
ᏥᏈᏍᏗ ᎦᏬᏂᏍᎪ ᎣᏍᏓ {{c1::ᏳᏓᏅᏔ.}}
tsgwi̋:sdi gawó:ni:sgó ő:sda {{c1::yú:da̋:nhta}}
fields.English: She talks a lot when she feels well.

fields.Text:
ᎤᏬᏘ {{c1::ᎤᎩᏌ‚}} ᎦᏣᏄᎳ ᎤᏗᏫᏒᎢ.
nv:wô:ti {{c1::ù:gi̋:sa}} ga:janű:la ù:dî:wsv̌:’i
fields.English: When he got some medicine‚ he got well fast.

fields.Text:
ᏪᏌ {{c1::ᏳᎵᏍᏓᏴᏃᎿ}} ᎠᎬᏍᏉᏍᎪᎢ.
we:sa {{c1::yú:lsdà:yv̋:hnohnâ}} à:gv:sgwó:sgó:’i
fields.English: A cat washes its face after it eats.

fields.Text:
ᎤᎩᏥᏕᏱ ᎠᏗᏗᏍᎪ ᏧᎸᏫᏍᏓᏁᏗ {{c1::ᏱᎩ.}}
u:gitsde̋:yi à:di:dǐ:sgô: ju:lv̋:hwsdà:nhdi {{c1::yi̋gi}}
fields.English: He gets up at dawn when he has to work.

fields.Text:
ᏯᏙᎵ ᏍᏚᏗ ᎬᏙᎠ ᏫᎦᎶᎯᏍᏗ ᏧᏪᏅᏒ {{c1::ᏲᎦ.}}
hyahtő:li sdù:di któ:’a wigaló:hisdi̋: juwé:nv̀:sv̋ {{c1::yő:ga}}
fields.English: You go through a narrow gate when you’re going to his house.

fields.Text:
ᎢᎸᏍᎩ ᎢᏳᏟᎶᏓ ᎡᎳᏓ ᎤᏂᎩᏒᎢ {{c1::ᎩᎳ}} ᎤᏓᏣᏁᎴᎢ.
ilv̋:sgi iyú:hli:lő:da e:lada ù:hnigî:sv̌:’i {{c1::kilá}} u:da:jâ:ně:lé:’i
fields.English: He walked a few miles before he caught a ride.

fields.Text:
ᎧᏄᏲᎳᏗᏍᎬᏛ {{c1::ᏥᏓᏥᏴᎠ.}}
kanú:yo:ladǐ:sgv́:dv́: {{c1::jidají:yv̋:’a}}
fields.English: It was misting when I came in.

fields.Text:
ᎤᏃᏍᏓ ᏓᎬᏩᎶᏗᏍᎪ ᎠᏢᏗ ᎣᏍᏓ {{c1::ᏱᏄᏩᏁᎳ.}}
u:hnő:sda dà:gv:walhdi:sgô: ahtlv̋:di ő:sda {{c1::yinuwâ:ne̋:la}}
fields.English: He charges one dollar when he fixes a tire.

fields.Text:
ᎤᏅᏉᎳᏛ ᎤᏍᎪᎸᏨ ᎤᎶᎩᎸ {{c1::ᎤᎵᎦᎵᏴᎭ.}}
u:nv:kwoltv̋: ù:sgolv̂:jv́ u:ló:gilv̋ {{c1::u:lhgali:yv̋:ha}}
fields.English: The rainbow faded when the cloud cleared up.

fields.Text:
ᏧᏩᎨᏓ ᏗᎿᏬ ᏚᏅᏒ ᏧᏴᏢ {{c1::ᎤᏪᎾ.}}
ju:hwage̋:da di:hnawó: dù:hnv́:sv́: ju:hyv́:dlv̋ {{c1::ù:we̋:na}}
fields.English: He took some thick clothing when he went up north.

fields.Text:
ᎠᏣᎳᎩ ᎤᏴᏜ {{c1::’ᏳᏂᏴᎭ’}} Ꮭ ᎤᏴᏜ ᏱᎦᏂᏱᏍᎪᎢ‚ ᎤᏴᏜᏍᎩᏂ ᎤᎬᏫᏳᏐ ᎤᏂᏱᏍᎪᎢ.
ajalagi u:hyv:dla {{c1::’yú:ni:yv̋:ha’}} hla u:hy:vdla yigá’ni:yǐ:sgó:’i u:hyv:dlásgini u:gv:wiyú:só: ù:ní:yi:sgó:’i
fields.English: Whenever a Cherokee ’catches’ a cold‚ he doesn’t catch the cold; rather‚ the cold catches him.

fields.Text:
ᎯᎳ ᎢᎦ ᏚᏗᏔᎮ {{c1::ᎩᎳ}} ᎤᏴᏍᏓᎡᎢ?
hilá: i:ga̋: dù:di:tahé: {{c1::kila}} ù:hyvsdá:’é:’i
fields.English: How many did he drink before he got drunk?

fields.Text:
ᎢᎦᏓ ᎠᎾᏑᏂᏙᎯ ᎤᏂᏥᏯ ᏓᏅᏗᏍᎪ {{c1::ᏳᎾᏑᎿ.}}
i:gá:da anasu:hní:dő:hi u:ni:jǐ:ya dà:nhdi:sgó: {{c1::yu:násű:hna}}
fields.English: Some fishermen use worms when they fish.

fields.Text:
ᎢᎾᏓ ᎤᏦᎾᏛ {{c1::ᎤᏛᎦᎾ}} ᎤᏯᏅᏒᎢ.
i:nadá u:jo:natv̋ {{c1::ù:tv̋:gà:na}} u:yá’nvsv̌:’i
fields.English: When he heard a snake rattling he froze.

fields.Text:
ᎦᎵᏉᎩ ᎢᏯᏂ ᏌᎶᎵ ᏕᏥᎸ {{c1::ᎠᎩᏃᎭᎴᎾ.}}
galhgwǒ:gi i:yáni̋: salǒ:li dě:jî:lv́ {{c1::a:gino:hale̋:na}}
fields.English: I killed seven squirrels when I went hunting.

fields.Text:
ᎪᏍᏗ ᎤᎵᏍᏓᏁᎴ Ꮲ {{c1::ᏪᏙᎲ.}} Ꮭ ᏱᎤᎷᏤᎢ.
go:hű:sdi ù:lsdâ:hně:lê dlv̋: {{c1::wě:dô:hv̋}} hla yi’u:lúhjé:’i
fields.English: Something happened to him while he was away. He didn’t come back.

fields.Text:
ᎦᎶᎯᏍᏗ ᎤᎵᏍᏚᎢᏓ ᎨᏒ {{c1::ᎠᏆᏕᎶᎰᏌ‚}} ᏩᎩᏴᏢᎢ.
galo:hisdi̋: u:lsdu’i̋:da gè:sv̋: {{c1::à:gwade:lo:hő:sa}} wà:giyv:hlv̌:’i
fields.English: When I found out the door was open‚ I went in.

fields.Text:
ᎩᎬᎭ ᏄᎵᏍᏔᏅ ᎤᏁᎦ ᎤᏄᏮ ᎩᎦ {{c1::ᏚᏴᏍᏉᎳ.}}
gi:gv:ha̋ nù:lstanv́ u:né:ga u:hnuwv́ gǐ:ga {{c1::dù:hyv̋:sgwǒla}}
fields.English: His white shirt got bloody when his nose started bleeding.

fields.Text:
ᎤᎭᎸᏂ ᎤᏃᏴᎪ ᎤᏓᎴᏅᏗ {{c1::ᏱᎩ}} ᏓᏂᎳᏫᎬᎢ.
u:halv:ní ù:nohyvhgó: u:dale:nhdi̋: {{c1::yi̋gi}} dà:nilâ:wi:gv̋:’i
fields.English: A bell rings when it’s time for church to start.

fields.Text:
ᎤᏍᏓᎦᎸ {{c1::ᏭᏴᏝ‚}} Ꮭ ᏔᎵᏁ ᏱᎤᏂᎪᎮᎢ.
u:sdá:galv̋: {{c1::wu:yv̋:la}} hla táli:né yúni:go:hé:’i
fields.English: When he entered the cave‚ they didn’t see him a second time.

fields.Text:
ᎪᎱᏍᏗ {{c1::ᏳᏍᎦᏍᏓᏁᎳ}} ᏥᏍᏆ‚ ᎠᏝᏫᏗᏍᎪᎢ.
gohű:sdi {{c1::yu:sgâ:sdà:ne̋:la}} ji:sgwa à:hlawi:dǐ:sgó:’i
fields.English: When something scares a bird‚ it flies away.

fields.Text:
ᎤᏍᏆᏂᎩᏗ ᎠᏂᏃᎮᏢᏍᎪ {{c1::ᏳᏂᏬᏂᏌ.}}
ű:sgwanikdi à:ni:hno:he:hlv̂:sgó: {{c1::yu:ní:wò:ni̋:sa}}
fields.English: They talk about interesting things when they talk.

fields.Text:
ᎪᎱᏍᏗ {{c1::ᎠᎪᏎᎸᏁᎳ‚}} ᎤᏔᏝᏬᏒᎢ.
go:hű:sdi {{c1::à:gò:sě:lv̂:ne̋:la}} ù:tahlawo:sv̌:’i
fields.English: When he was called names‚ he became enraged.

fields.Text:
ᎤᏥᏆᎸᏛ ᎤᎵᏍᏆᎵᏎᎸ ᏡᎬ {{c1::ᏙᏧᎵᏔᏗᎾ.}}
ù:tsgwalv:tv̋ ù:lsgwâ:lse:lv́ lhgv̋ {{c1::do:jú:lhtadi̋:na}}
fields.English: He broke his ankle when he jumped from a tree.

fields.Text:
ᎠᏍᎦᏯ {{c1::ᏳᏛᏐᎿ}} ᎤᏛᏐᏅ ᎠᏃᏎᎰᎢ.
asgaya {{c1::yű:tvsohna}} u:tvsohnv̋: à:nò:sě:hő:’i
fields.English: When a man becomes fully grown‚ they call him an old man.

fields.Text:
ᏥᏈᏍᏗ {{c1::ᏳᎵᏍᏓᏴᎿ‚}} ᎤᏩᎫᎴᎪᎢ.
tsgwì:sdi {{c1::yú:lsdà:yv̋:hna}} uwa:ku:lê:gó:’i
fields.English: Whenever he eats a lot‚ he belches.

fields.Text:
ᏥᏈᏍᏗ ᎤᎵᏍᏓᏴᏅ {{c1::ᏱᎩ}} ᎠᏟᎩᏍᎪᎢ.
tsgwi̋:sdi u:lsdà:yv́hnv̋: {{c1::yi̋gi}} à:hligí:sgó:’i
fields.English: When he has eaten a lot‚ he has a nightmare.

fields.Text:
ᏧᏩᏒᎯ ᏂᏚᎵᏍᏔᏅ ᏧᏬᏰᏂ {{c1::ᏚᏴᏜᏕᎳ.}}
juwà:sv̋:hi nidù:lstanv́: juwò:ye̋:ni {{c1::duhyv:dláde̋:la}}
fields.English: His hands became numb when they became cold.

fields.Text:
ᎤᏪᎵᎯᏍᏗ ᎤᏓᏅᏓᏛᎢ {{c1::ᎤᏛᎦᎾ}} ᎤᏙᏓ ᎤᏢᎬᎢ.
uwe:lihi̋:sdi ù:da:nhdá’dv̌:’i {{c1::ù:tv̋:gà:na}} u:do:da u:dlv:gv̋:’i
fields.English: He felt worried when he heard that his father was sick.

fields.Text:
ᎤᏬᏚᎯ ᏓᏆᎴᎳ ᎠᏥᏁᎸ {{c1::ᏚᏍᏆᏓ.}}
uwo:dű:hi dagwalé:la à:jì:ne:lv́ {{c1::dù:sgwá’da}}
fields.English: She was given a pretty car when she graduated.

fields.Text:
ᏓᏆᎴᎳ ᎬᏗ {{c1::ᎤᏩᏂᎳ}} ᏔᎷᎩᏍᎩ ᎨᏛ‚ ᎤᏟᏴᏈᏛᏅᎢ.
dagwalé:la gv̋hdi {{c1::ù:wa̋:hnila}} talu:gì:sgi ge:tv̋ ù:hliyvhgwidv̂:nv̌:’i
fields.English: When he hit the steel post with a car‚ it bent.

fields.Text:
ᎪᎱᏍᏗ {{c1::ᏯᏍᎦᏍᏓᏁ}} ᎠᏫ‚ ᎠᏟᏴᏌᎾᏩᏍᏗᏍᎪᎢ.
go:hű:sdi {{c1::yasgâ:sdà:ne̋}} ahwi à:hliyv̌:sánà:wsdǐ:sgó:ʔi
fields.English: When a deer is trying to scare something‚ it snorts.

fields.Text:
ᏩᏚᎾ ᎤᎦᎵᏍᏔᏅ ᎤᎳᏏᏕᎾ {{c1::ᎤᏓᎷᏯ.}}
wadu:na ù:gâ:lstanv́ u:là:sihde̋:na {{c1::u:dá:lu:hya}}
fields.English: He cut a blood vessel when he cut himself on the foot with an axe.

fields.Text:
ᎠᏕᎳ {{c1::ᏧᏔᏲᏎᎳ}} ᎤᏪᏥ ᏔᎵᏍᎪ ᎠᏕᎸ ᏭᏅᏁᎸᎢ.
adě:la {{c1::u:tayo:se̋:la}} uwě:ji talsgó adě:lv̋ wù:nv́:ne:lv̌:’i
fields.English: When his son asked him for some money‚ he sent him a twenty dollar bill.

fields.Text:
ᏍᏆᏞᏍᏗ {{c1::ᎤᏩᏂᎳ}} ᏦᎳᏂ‚ ᎤᎵᎪᏛᏅᎢ.
sgwà:hle̋:sdi {{c1::ù:wa̋:hnila}} jolani ù:lhko:dv:hnv̌:’i
fields.English: When a ball hit the window‚ it shattered.

fields.Text:
ᎣᎩᏅᏌ {{c1::ᎣᎩᎾᎳᏍᎦᎸᎭ‚}} ᏥᏠᏒᎢ.
o:ginv̋:sa {{c1::ò:ginalâ:sgalv̋:ha}} jì:hlo:sv̌:’i
fields.English: When we played ball by ourselves‚ I beat him.

fields.Text:
ᏓᏂᏍᏓᏲᎯᎲ ᎾᎥ {{c1::ᏱᎩ}} ᏗᏓᏁᏗ ᎠᎾᏓᎾᏁᏒᎲᏍᎪ ᏴᏫ.
dà:ni:sdayo:hihv̋: na’v̋: {{c1::yi̋gi}} di:da̋:hnehdi à:nada:nané:svhvsgó: yv:wi
fields.English: When it’s close to Christmas‚ people shop for gifts.

fields.Text:
ᎦᏓᎭ {{c1::ᏄᎵᏍᏔᎾ}} ᎤᏄᏮ ᎤᎿᏩᎢᏴᏒᎢ.
ga:da:ha̋: {{c1::nù:lstána}} ù:hnúwv̋: ù:hnawá:’i:yv́:sv̌:’i
fields.English: When his shirt got dirty‚ he changed it.

fields.Text:
{{c1::ᎤᎦᎾᏬᏌ‚}} ᎤᎿᏪᏒ ᎦᏌᎴᎾ.
{{c1::ù:ga:nawő:sa}} ù:hnawé:sv́ gà:salě:na
fields.English: When it got warm‚ he took off his coat.

fields.Text:
ᎢᏤ ᎠᎾᎦᎵᏍᎩ {{c1::ᎤᏝᎾ‚}} ᎠᎯᏓ ᎤᏂᎩᏒ ᏓᏆᎴᎳ.
ije̋: anà:galǐ:sgi {{c1::ù:hlána}} ahi̋:da ù:hnígí:sv́ dagwalé:la
fields.English: When he put a new battery in the car‚ it started up easily.

fields.Text:
ᎪᎱᏍᏗ {{c1::ᏯᎬᏍᎦᎳᏁᎳ}} ᎠᎯᏓ ᎠᏩᏘᏍᎪᎢ.
go:hű:sdi {{c1::yagv̂:sgalv̂:ne̋:la}} ahi̋:da à:hwahtǐ:sgó’i
fields.English: When something is hidden from him‚ he finds it easily.

fields.Text:
{{c1::ᏥᏃᎠᎵᏙᎲ}} ᎠᎩᏲᎱᏎᎸ ᎭᏰᎵᏍᏗ.
{{c1::jino’alǐ:dô:hv̋:}} à:giyo:hǔ:sé:lv́ haye:lsdi
fields.English: I lost my knife while hunting.

fields.Text:
{{c1::ᏥᏍᏆᏛ}} ᏥᏰᏫᏍᎬ ᏰᎦᏟ ᏓᏥᏴᏈᏛᏂ.
{{c1::jì:sgwá’dv̋}} ji:ye:wì:sgv̋: hye’gahli dají:yvhgwidv̀:nî
fields.English: When I finish sewing the quilt‚ I am going to hem it.

fields.Text:
ᎤᏔᎾ ᏗᎦᏚᎲ {{c1::ᏳᏪᎾ}} ᎠᏣᏅᏍᎪᎢ.
ű:tana digadú:hv̋: {{c1::yuwe̋:na}} à:janv:sgó:’i
fields.English: When he goes to the city‚ he dresses up.

fields.Text:
ᎤᏃᏍᎩᏒ {{c1::ᎠᎫᎢᏍᏔᎾ.}} ᎤᏓᏱᎸᎢ.
u:no:sgí:sv̋: {{c1::à:gu’i̋:stana}} ù:dahyilv̌:’i
fields.English: When he was accused of stealing‚ he denied it.

fields.Text:
{{c1::ᎤᎾᎦᎸᎭ‚}} ᎠᎾᎦᎵᏍᎩ ᏗᏨᏍᏗ ᏚᏠᏒᎢ.
{{c1::ù:nâ:galv̋:ha}} anà:galǐ:sgi di:jv̋:sdi dùhdlo:sv̌:’i
fields.English: When the lightning flashed‚ the electric lights went out.

fields.Text:
ᎦᏅᎯᏓ ᎠᎦᏐᏍᎬ ᎠᎦᏐᏍᎪ ᎠᎹ {{c1::ᏳᏁᎩᏎᎾ.}}
ganv:hi̋:da à:ksô:sgv̋: à:ksô:sgó: ama {{c1::yu:né:gì:se̋:na}}
fields.English: He goes down a long hill when he goes after water.

fields.Text:
ᎩᎶ ᎤᏯᏂᏍᎬ {{c1::ᎤᏛᎦᎾ}} ᎤᎦᏔᎲᏒᎢ.
kilő: ù:hyanísgv̋: {{c1::ù:tv̋:gà:na}} ù:ktahv́:sv̌:’i
fields.English: When he heard someone calling him‚ he turned around.

fields.Text:
{{c1::ᏫᏄᎷᏨᎾᏊ}} ᎤᎦᏔᎲᏍᏗ ᎤᏚᎸᎲᎢ.
{{c1::winú:luhjv̋:nagwu}} u:ktahv:sdi̋: ù:du:lv:hv̌:’i
fields.English: He wanted to turn back before he got there.

fields.Text:
ᎠᏧᏣᏊ {{c1::ᏥᎨᏒ}} ᎤᎦᏙᎲᏒᎢ.
achű:jagwu {{c1::jigè:sv̋:}} ù:ktohv́sv̋:’i
fields.English: He became wise when he was just a boy.

fields.Text:
Ꮲ ᎤᏪᏅᏍᏗ {{c1::ᏯᏛᏅᎢᏍᏗ}} ᎠᏓᎨᏍᎪᎢ.
hlv̋: uwe:nv̀:sdi̋ {{c1::yadv́:nv’isdi̋:}} à:da:kě:sgó:’i
fields.English: When he’s getting ready to go somewhere‚ he uses a mirror.

fields.Text:
ᎤᏪᏥ ᎠᏧᏣ {{c1::ᏳᏍᏕᎸᎭ}} ᏚᎸᏫᏍᏓᏁᎲ ᎠᎵᎮᎵᏤᎰᎢ.
uwě:jí achű:ja {{c1::yu:sdé:lv̋:ha}} dù:lv:hwísdà:ne:hv̋ à:li:hě:lî:chehó:’i
fields.English: When his son helps him work‚ he thanks him.

fields.Text:
ᎦᎵᏦᏕ {{c1::ᎤᏴᏝ}} ᎤᎵᏍᏚᎴᏒᎢ.
galhjo:dé {{c1::ù:yv̋:hla}} ù:lsdu:lê:sv:’î
fields.English: When he entered the house‚ he took off his cap.

fields.Text:
ᎯᎳ ᎢᎪᎯᏓ ᎠᎯᎵᏙᎰ {{c1::ᏳᎵᏍᏚᎴᎭ?}}
hilá: i:gó:hi̋:d à:hili:dô:hó {{c1::yú:lsdu:le̋:ha}}
fields.English: How long does it take when she washes her hair?

fields.Text:
ᎪᎱᏍᏗ {{c1::ᎤᏩᏂᎳ}} ᎠᎦᏙᎵ‚ ᎤᎵᏍᏛᏂᎸᎢ.
go:hű:sdi {{c1::uwa̋:hnila}} aktő:li ù:lsdv:hnílv́’i
fields.English: When something hit him in the eye‚ he shook his head.

fields.Text:
{{c1::ᎩᎳ}} ᎠᎩᎷᏨ ᎤᎵᏍᏆᏛ ᏓᏂᏬᏂᏍᎬᎢ.
{{c1::kila}} wági’luhjv́wu ù:lsgwá’dv́ dà:ni:wó:nisgv̋’i
fields.English: I had just arrived when their speeches ended.

fields.Text:
ᏗᎦᏚᎲ {{c1::ᏳᏪᎾ}} ᏧᏓᏅᎦᎸᏓ ᏓᎿᏬᏍᎪᎢ ᎣᏍᏓᏃ ᎠᎵᏍᏇᏚᏬ ᎠᎵᏍᏇᏚᎲᏍᎪᎢ.
diga:dú:hv̋: {{c1::yuwe̋:na}} ju:danv:galv̋:da dà:hnawó:sgó:’i ő:sdahnó: álsgwè:tuwó à:lsgwé:tuhvsgó:’i
fields.English: When he goes to town‚ he puts on clean clothes and a good hat.

fields.Text:
ᎩᏟ ᏓᏑᏫᏍᎬ {{c1::ᎤᏛᎦᎾ‚}} ᎤᏓᎾᏫᏍᏔᏅᎢ.
gihli dà:suhwisgv̋: {{c1::ù:tv̋:gà:na}} ù:danâ:wstanv̌:’i
fields.English: When he heard the dog bark‚ he ran.

fields.Text:
ᏁᎳᏚᏊ {{c1::ᏄᏕᏘᏴᎭ}} ᎤᏁᎳᏛᎢ ᎣᎩᎾᎵᎢ.
ně:lá:dú:gwú {{c1::nù:de:tiyv̋:ha}} ù:ně:ldv́ o:gina:li̋:’i
fields.English: My friend got married as soon as he turned eighteen.

fields.Text:
ᎠᎦᎵᏍᎬ {{c1::ᏭᏅᎾ}} ᎢᎾᏓ ᎦᏁᎦ ᎤᏍᏓᎦᏴᏢᎢ.
agà:lí:sgv̋: {{c1::wú:nv̋:na}} i:nada ganè:ga ù:sdagayv:hlv̌:’i
fields.English: When he put the snake skin out in the sunshine‚ it became crisp.

fields.Text:
{{c1::ᎦᎷᏨ}} ᎯᏯᏎᎮᎸ ᎾᎿ ᎤᏗ ᏓᏆᎴᎳ.
{{c1::gáluhjv̋:}} hi:yà:sehé:lv nà:hná uhdí dagwalé:la
fields.English: When he gets here show him where to park the car.

fields.Text:
ᎠᏧᏣ ᏦᎳᏂ {{c1::ᎤᏲᏍᏔᎾ‚}} ᎤᏙᏓ ᎤᏍᎦᏨᎢ.
achű:ja jő:lani {{c1::uyő:stana}} u:do:da ù:sgâ:jv̌:’i
fields.English: When the boy broke the window‚ his father reprimanded him.

fields.Text:
ᏍᏆᏞᏍᏗ {{c1::ᏩᎦᏗᏁᎳ}} ᎤᏍᏆᏞᏒᎢ.
sgwà:hle̋:sdi {{c1::wagádì:ne̋:la}} ù:sgwâ:hle:sv̌:’i
fields.English: When the ball was thrown to him‚ he caught it.

fields.Text:
ᏗᎪᏪᎶᏗ {{c1::ᏱᎦᏢᎭ}} ᎠᏍᏆᎶᎪᎢ.
digo:hwe̋:lò:di {{c1::yikdlv̋:ha}} asgwalô:gó:’i
fields.English: Whenever you sharpen a pencil‚ it becomes shorter.

fields.Text:
ᎩᏟ {{c1::ᏚᎦᏘᎴᎾ}} ᎦᏅᏍᏓ ᎬᏗ ᎤᏍᏉᎭᎸᏂᎸᎢ.
gi:hli {{c1::dù:ktǐ:le̋:na}} gansda gv̋hdi ù:sgwo:halv̌:nî:lv̌:’i
fields.English: When the dog attacked him‚ he hit it in the stomach with a stick.

fields.Text:
ᎤᎾᎵᎢ {{c1::ᎤᎶᏌ}} ᎤᏐᎸᏓᎩᎡᎸᎢ.
u:na:li̋:’i {{c1::ù:lő:sa}} ù:so:lv:dagí’e:lv̌:’i
fields.English: When his friend passed by‚ he waved to him.

fields.Text:
ᏠᎨᏏ {{c1::ᏱᏙᏓᏳᎸᏫᏍᏓᏁᎵ‚}} ᎠᏑᎳᎢᏴᏍᎪᎢ.
dlo:ge̋:si {{c1::yido:dayú:lv:hwísdà:ne̋:li}} à:su:lá’i:yv́:sgó:’i
fields.English: Whenever he is going to work in the garden‚ he changes his pants.

fields.Text:
ᎠᏏᎳᏛ ᎠᏓᏬᎯᎳᏗᏍᎬ {{c1::ᎤᏲᏍᏔᎾ}} ᎤᏑᎶ ᎤᏑᎴᏒ ᎣᏍᏓ ᏄᏩᏁᎸᎢ.
asǐ:ládv̋: adawo:híladì:sgv̋: {{c1::ù:yostana}} u:su:ló ú:su:lé:sv́ ő:sda nù:wá:ne:lv̌:’i
fields.English: When he tore his pants while crossing over a fence‚ he took them off and mended them.

fields.Text:
ᏙᏯ ᎾᎥ {{c1::ᏱᎦᎷᏤᎳ}} ᎠᏓᏃᏴᏟᏍᏗᏍᎪᎢ.
do:ya na’v̋ {{c1::yigáluhche̋:la}} à:dano:hyv:hlisdi:sgó:’i
fields.English: When you get close to a beaver‚ it makes noise.

fields.Text:
ᏒᎩ ᎢᎾᎨ ᎡᎯ {{c1::ᏳᏅᏂᏍᏔᎾ}} ᎠᏂᏣᎳᎩ‚ ᏧᏪᏥ ᏓᎾᏑᏴᏍᎪᎢ.
sv̀:gi ǐ:náge̋ e̋:hi {{c1::yu:nv́:hnistana}} ani:jalagi juwě:ji dà:nasǔ:yv́sgo’i
fields.English: When Cherokees cook wild onions‚ they mix them with eggs.

fields.Text:
{{c1::ᎤᏃᎱᎦᎾ}} ᎢᎦᏓ ᏓᏒᏢ ᏚᏲᏍᏔᏅ
{{c1::u:no:hű:gà:nâ}} i:gá:da 8dà:svhdlv̋: dù:yó:stanv̌:’i
fields.English: When it flooded‚ the water destroyed some of the bridges.

fields.Text:
ᎤᏬᏰᏂ ᎤᎴᏴᏒ ᎤᏗᏞᎩ ᎣᏏ {{c1::ᎤᏒᏂᎳ.}}
uwò:ye̋:ni ù:lé:yv:sv́ u:di̋:hlehgi ó:si {{c1::ù:sv̋:hnila}}
fields.English: He burned his hand when he touched a hot stove.

fields.Text:
ᏫᎬᎵᏟᏍᎩ {{c1::ᏯᏙᏔᎾ}} ᎠᎹ ᎠᏔᏃᎴᎪᎢ.
wigv:lidli̋:sgi {{c1::yáhtò:tana}} ama à:tanǒ:lê:gó:’i
fields.English: When you heat water to its boiling point‚ it steams.

fields.Text:
ᎪᏛ {{c1::ᏭᏗᎾ}} ᎠᏓᏪᎳᎩᏍᎩ ᎤᏔᏍᎩᏒᎢ.
go:tv̋: {{c1::wu:di̋:na}} adawe:lagì:sgi ù:tasgí:sv̌:’i
fields.English: When he threw the gunpowder into the fire‚ it exploded.

fields.Text:
ᎠᎦᎷᎦ {{c1::ᎤᏩᏂᎳ}} ᏡᎬᎢ ᎤᏓᏄᏖᏲᎸᎢ.
a:galu:ga {{c1::uwa̋:hnila}} dluhgv̋:’i ù:danú:te:yô:lv̌:’i
fields.English: When the twister hit the tree‚ it twisted.

fields.Text:
ᎯᏰᎩ {{c1::ᎠᎪᏎᎳ‚}} ᎤᏰᏨᎢ.
hiyè:gi {{c1::à:gò:se̋:la}} ù:yé:jv̌:’i
fields.English: When he was told to wake up‚ he woke up.

fields.Text:
ᏓᏓᏁᏎᏍᎬ ᎤᏮᏔᏂᏓᏍᏗ ᎤᏯᎸ ᏧᏓᏁᏎᏍᏗ {{c1::ᎠᏥᏔᏲᏎᎳ.}}
dà:da:hne:sé:sgv̋: u:whtani̋:dà:sdi ù:hyalv́ ju:da:hnesè:sdi̋: {{c1::ajì:tayo:se̋:la}}
fields.English: He looked for his conjuring material when he was asked to conjure.

fields.Text:
ᏗᎦᏚᎲ {{c1::ᏫᎦᎷᏨ}} ᎠᏍᎦᏯ‚ ᏓᏆᎴᎳ ᏓᏳᏩᏏ.
diga:dú:hv̋: {{c1::wigáluhjv̋:}} asgaya dagwalé:la dayuhwási
fields.English: When he gets to town‚ the man is going to buy a car.

fields.Text:
ᏞᏍᏗ ᏥᏙᏍᎩᏴᎩ {{c1::ᎦᎵᏍᏓᏴᎲᏍᎬᎢ.}}
hlè:sdí jido:skíyv́:gî {{c1::galì:sdâ:yvhvsgv̋:’i}}
fields.English: Don’t tickle me while I am eating.

fields.Text:
ᏚᎳᏑᏢ ᏚᎧᏁᏴᎲ {{c1::ᏚᎳᏑᎴᏌ.}}
dù:lâ:su:hlv̋: dù:kane:hyv́:hv́ {{c1::dù:lâ:su:le̋:sa}}
fields.English: He untied his shoes when he took them off.

fields.Text:
ᏚᎦᏔᏍᏔᏅ ᎤᏍᎪᏍᏗ ᎠᏨᏍᏛ {{c1::ᏚᎦᏙᏴᏌ.}}
dù:ktâ:stanv́ u:sgő:sdi à:jv̌:ysdv̋ {{c1::dù:ktǒ:yv̂:sa}}
fields.English: He closed his eyes when he was blinded by a bright light.

fields.Text:
{{c1::ᏱᏚᎦᏘᏅᏕᏌ}} Ꮭ ᎣᏍᏓ ᏯᎪᏩᏘᏍᎪᎢ.
{{c1::yidǔ:ktínv̀:de̋:sa}} hla ő:sda yago:whti:sgó:’i
fields.English: When she takes off her glasses‚ she doesn’t see well.

fields.Text:
ᎢᎦᏓ ᎠᎦᎵᏍᎬ {{c1::ᏯᏁᏙᎭ}} ᏧᎵᏏᎩ ᏗᎦᏘᏅᏘᏗ ᏓᎾᎦᏘᏅᏛᏍᎪᎢ.
igá:da à:gá:li:sgv̋ {{c1::yané:dő:ha}} jű:lsihgi di:ktinv̋:tdi dà:naktinv:tvsgó:’i
fields.English: When some people are in the sun‚ they put on dark glasses.

fields.Text:
{{c1::ᏓᎵᏲᎯᎲ}} ᎢᎪᎯᏓ ᎩᎶ ᏚᏃᏍᎩᏎ ᏧᎳᏑᎶ.
{{c1::dà:lǐ:yó:hihv̋}} igǒ:hi̋:da kilő dù:no:sgí:se ju:là:sǔ:ló
fields.English: While he was putting on his socks‚ someone stole his shoes.

fields.Text:
ᎤᎾᏙᏓᏉᏅ ᎤᏒ ᎤᏬᏂᎯᏍᏗ ᏚᏒᏍᏔᏅᎢ {{c1::ᎬᏩᏔᏲᏎᎳ}} ᎤᏬᏂᎯᏍᏗᎢ.
u:nadǒ:dágwohnv̋: usv̋: uwò:ni̋:hisdi dù:sv:stánv́:’i {{c1::gv:wahtayo:se̋:la}} uwò:nǐ:hísdi̋:’i
fields.English: He scheduled his speech for Monday night when asked to speak.

fields.Text:
ᎠᎺᏉ ᏓᎩᏐᏨ ᎠᏂᏲᏍᎩ {{c1::ᏥᏥᏯᎥᎢ.}}
amě:gwő: dà:gi:sohjv́ ani:yósgi̋: {{c1::jijiyá’v̋:’i}}
fields.English: I crossed the ocean when I was in the military service.

fields.Text:
{{c1::ᏳᎾᎵᏍᏓᏴᏃᎿᏊ}} ᏕᎬᏗᏰᏍᎪ ᏗᏖᎵᏙᎢ.
{{c1::yú:lsdà:yv̋:hnohnagwû}} de:gv́:di:yê:sgó: di:te:lǐ:dó
fields.English: She washes the dishes immediately after they finish eating.

fields.Text:
ᎦᏣᏄᎵ {{c1::ᎤᏩᏕᏯᏍᏔᎾ}} ᎠᏕᏲᎲ ᏚᏟᏆᏗᏅᏒ ᏓᏆᎴᎳ.
ga:janu:li {{c1::uwa:de̋:ystana}} à:dé:yohv̋ dù:hlihgwadǐ:nv̂:sv́ dagwalé:la
fields.English: When he went around the curve too fast‚ he turned the car over.

fields.Text:
ᏧᎾᏓᏍᏚᏗ ᎠᎦᏘᏅᏒ ᏗᏓᎯᎯ {{c1::ᎠᏥᏂᏴᎭ.}}
ju:nada:sdù:di̋ à:gà:tihnv́:sv di:da̋:hihî {{c1::à:jini:yv̋:ha}}
fields.English: The murderer was taken to jail when he was caught.

fields.Text:
Ꮎ ᎤᏍᏗ ᎠᏧᏣ ᏗᏓᏰᏠᎯ ᎢᏳᎵᏍᏙᏗ ᎤᏚᎵ {{c1::ᎠᏛᏒᎢ.}}
ná usdi̋ achű:ja didahye̋:hlohi iyú:lsdohdi̋ ù:du:lí {{c1::à:tvsv̋:’i}}
fields.English: That little boy wants to become a surgeon when he grows up.

fields.Text:
ᎠᎨᏳᏣ {{c1::ᎤᎦᏔᏍᏓᏁᎳ}} ᎤᏕᎰᏒᎢ.
age:hyű:ja {{c1::ù:ktâ:sdà:ne̋:la}} ù:de:hǒ:sv́:’i
fields.English: When the girl winked at him‚ he got embarrassed.

fields.Text:
ᎢᎦᏓ ᏗᎦᏘᏍᏗ ᏓᏅᏗᏍᎪ ᏥᏍᏛᎾ {{c1::ᏱᏚᏂᏯᎳ.}}
i:gá:da diga:tisdi dà:nhdi:sgô jí:sdv:na {{c1::yidu:ni̋:hyala}}
fields.English: Some people use gigs whenever they hunt crawdads.

fields.Text:
{{c1::ᎠᎾᏁᎯᎲ}} ᏗᎪᏪᎶᏗ ᎬᏗ ᎠᏥᏘᏍᏙᏔᏅᎢ.
{{c1::à:ná:hne:hihv̋}} digo:hwe̋:lò:di gv̋hdi à:ji:tisdohtánv̌:’i
fields.English: While they were wrestling‚ he was accidentally stabbed with a pencil.

fields.Text:
ᏗᎪᏏᏐᏗ ᎤᏔᏲᏢ ᎦᎸᏉᏗ ᎪᏪᎵ {{c1::ᎤᎪᎵᏰᎠ.}}
digo:si̋:sohdi ù:tayo:hlv́ galv̋:kwdi go:hwe:li {{c1::ù:go:lǐ:ye̋:’a}}
fields.English: He asked for a discussion when he read the Bible.

fields.Text:
ᏗᎦᏁᎯᎯ ᎨᏒ ᏔᎵᏚᏏᏁ ᏗᏥᏂᏙᎯ {{c1::ᏥᎨᏒᎢ.}}
diga:hne̋:hihi gè:sv̋ táladu:si:ne̋: dijini:dő:hi {{c1::jigè:sv̋:’i}}
fields.English: I was a wrestler when I was in the twelfth grade.

fields.Text:
ᏂᎦᏚ ᏯᏆᏕᏘᏴᏓ {{c1::ᏥᎨᏒ}} ᎠᏆᏕᏠᏆᎥ ᏗᏣᎳᎩ ᏗᎩᎪᎵᏰᏗ.
nigádu yágwade:tiyv̋:d {{c1::jigè:sv̋:}} à:gwade:hlohgwá’v́ di:jalagi di:gigo:lǐ:yê:di̋:
fields.English: I learned to read Cherokee when I was fourteen years old.

fields.Text:
ᏗᎧᏃᏩᏛᏍᏗ {{c1::ᏱᏚᏂᏲᏍᏔᎾ}} ᎢᎦᏓ ᎬᏩᎩᏘ ᎾᎾᏛᏁᎰᎢ.
dikanowadv́:sdi {{c1::yidu:ní:yő:stana}} igá:da gv̋:wakti nà:nadv́:ne:hó:’i
fields.English: When some people break the law‚ they get away with it.

fields.Text:
ᏗᎪᏍᏓᏱ ᏗᎵᏍᏙᏰᏗ ᏧᏮᏙᏗ ᎤᎸᏉᏗ {{c1::ᎦᏰᏫᏒᏍᎬᎢ.}}
digő:sdà;yi di:lsdoyhdi juwhdóhdi̋ u:lv̋:kwdi {{c1::ga:ye:wsv́sgv̋:’i}}
fields.English: She likes to use sharp scissors while sewing.

fields.Text:
ᏗᏂᏓᎿᏫ ᏣᎢᏒ {{c1::ᏭᎪᎭ‚}} ᎤᎵᏘᏒᎢ.
di:ni:da̋:hnawi já:’isv̋ {{c1::wu:gő:ha}} ù:ltí:sv:’i
fields.English: When he saw his enemy coming‚ he ran away.

fields.Text:
ᎠᎦᎵᏍᎬ {{c1::ᏰᏙ}} ᏧᎵᏏᎩ ᏚᎦᏘᏅᏙᎢ.
à:ga:lǐ:sgv̋ {{c1::yě:dő}} jű:lsihgi dù:ktinv:tó:’i
fields.English: When she’s out in the sun‚ she wears dark glasses.

fields.Text:
Ꮭ ᏯᎩᎸᏉᏗ ᏗᏆᎵᏰᏑᎶᏗ {{c1::ᏱᏓᎩᎸᏫᏍᏓᏁᎭ.}}
hla yagílv:kwdi di:gwaliyè:sǔ:lô:dí {{c1::yidagílv:hwisdà:ne̋:ha}}
fields.English: I don’t like to wear gloves when I’m working.

fields.Text:
ᏍᏓᏯ {{c1::ᏧᎾᏌᏁᏌ}} ᏍᏕᏱᏓ‚ ᏓᏆᏍᎦᎴᏍᏔᏅᎢ.
sda̋:ya {{c1::jù:nsané:sv̋}} sdě:yída dà:gwá:sgalé:stanv̌:’i
fields.English: When he pulled the rope hard‚ it slipped out of my hand.

fields.Text:
ᎡᏝᏪ ᎨᏒ ᏴᏫ ᎦᏬᏂᏍᎩ {{c1::ᎦᏬᏂᏍᎬ}} ᎢᎪᎯᏓ.
e:hlawe̋: gè:sv́ yv:wi gawò:ni̋:sgi {{c1::gawó:ni:sgv̋}} i:go:hi̋:da
fields.English: The people were quiet while the speaker spoke.

fields.Text:
ᏗᎪᏪᎵ ᎦᏍᎩᎸ ᏚᏝᎥ ᏚᏗᎦᎴᏴ ᏗᎪᏪᎶᏗ {{c1::ᎤᏯᎳ.}}
digo:hwe:lî ga:sgilv̋ dù:hlá’v̋ dù:di:galé:yv digo:hwe̋:lò:dî {{c1::ù:hyála}}
fields.English: He scattered the papers on the table when he looked for his pencil.

fields.Text:
ᎠᎿᏬ ᎤᎵᎬᎭᎷᏴ ᎤᏗᎦᎴᏲᏨ ᏍᏓᏯ {{c1::ᎤᏃᎸᎾ.}}
ahnawó: ù:lgv:halû:hyv̋ ù:digalě:jô:jv́ sda̋:ya {{c1::ù:no:lv̋:na}}
fields.English: Pieces of cloth scattered when the wind blew hard.

fields.Text:
ᎦᏗᎨᏂ ᎤᏰᏝᎸ ᎫᎫ ᎤᏲᏨ {{c1::ᎤᎳᏍᏛᏔᎾ}} ᎠᎹᏱ ᎠᏚᎯᏂᏙᎲᎢ.
ga:di:ge̋:ni ù:hyehlálv́ gù:gu u:yò:jv̋ {{c1::ù:lâ:sdv̋:tana}} amǎ:yi à:du:hi:nǐ:dô:hv̋:’i
fields.English: A broken glass cut his heel when he stepped on it while wading in water.

fields.Text:
ᎡᎳᏗ {{c1::ᏭᏗᎾ}} ᏍᏆᏞᏍᏗ ᎤᏓᏗᏅᏒᎢ.
e:ladí {{c1::wǔ:di̋:na}} sgwà:hle̋:sdi ù:dadi:nv̂:sv̌:’i
fields.English: When he threw the ball down‚ it bounced.

fields.Text:
ᏙᏱ ᏗᏜ ᏓᏂᏙᎬ ᏗᎾᏓᏂᏱᏍᎩ {{c1::ᏩᎩᎷᏣ.}}
dǒ:yi dí:dla dà:ni:dô:gv́ di:nda:ní:yi̋:sgi {{c1::wágiluhja}}
fields.English: The police were standing outside when I got there.

fields.Text:
ᎦᏙᎲ ᏂᏗᏤᏅᏓ {{c1::ᏧᏫᎬᏯᏂᏍᎬ?}}
gadò:hv́: nidijé:nv:da {{c1::juwigv:yaní:sgv̋}}
fields.English: Why didn’t you come when I was calling you?

fields.Text:
{{c1::ᏚᏯᏪᏣ}} ᎦᏌᎴᏂ ᎦᏁᎲ ᎤᏙᏅᏔᏅᎢ.
{{c1::dù:yawe̋:ja}} ga:salě:n gahne:hv̋ ù:dô:nhtanv:’i
fields.English: When he got tired of holding the coat‚ he dropped it.

fields.Text:
ᎠᎹᏱ ᏭᏕᎵᏨ ᎦᏆᏘᏗ {{c1::ᎤᏓᏆᏕᏍᏔᎾ.}}
amǎ:yi̋ wù:de:lî:jv́ ga̋:gwatdi {{c1::ù:dá:gwade̋:stana}}
fields.English: The wheel went into the water when it came off.

fields.Text:
ᎦᏟᏓ {{c1::ᎤᏲᏍᏔᎾ‚}} ᏄᏓᎴ ᏭᏴᎲᎢ.
ga̋:hlida {{c1::uyő:stana}} nu:dále̋: wú:yv:hv:’i
fields.English: When he broke an arrow‚ he went and got another one.

fields.Text:
ᎦᏙ ᎤᏍᏗ ᎠᏓ ᏭᏗᏍᎪ ᎦᎵᏣᏗ {{c1::ᏱᏦᏢᎿ?}}
gado ű:sdi ada hvhdi:sgó: gahlja’di {{c1::yijohlv̋:hna}}
fields.English: What type of wood do you use when you make a bow?

fields.Text:
ᎠᎹᏱ {{c1::ᏳᏑᏁᎾ}} ᎦᎵᏦᏛ ᏩᏯᎣᎢ.
amǎ:yí {{c1::yu:su:hne̋:na}} gahljo:tv̋ wayá’ó:’i
fields.English: When he goes fishing‚ he lives in a tent.

fields.Text:
ᎦᎵᏦᏕ ᎤᏴᏍᏗ {{c1::ᏳᏚᎵ}} ᏪᏌ‚ ᎦᎶᎯᏍᏗ ᏕᎦᏣᎵᎪᏍᎪᎢ.
galhjo:dé u:yv:sdi̋ {{c1::yu:dúli̋}} wě:sa galo:hisdi̋: de:gá:jalgo:sgó:’i
fields.English: When the cat wants to go inside the house‚ he scratches on the door.

fields.Text:
ᎤᏴᏜ {{c1::ᏣᎩᏂᏱᏍᎬ}} ᎠᎦᎾᎦᏘ ᎠᎩᏣᏲᏢᎢ.
u:hyv:dla {{c1::jà:gíni:yí:sgv̋:}} agánakti à:gi:jáyo:hlv́:’i
fields.English: When I had a cold‚ a doctor gave me an injection.

fields.Text:
ᏪᏌ {{c1::ᎤᎨᎮᎾ}} ᎩᏟ‚ ᏪᏌ ᏡᎬᎢ ᎤᎸᏒᎢ.
wě:sa {{c1::ù:ké:he̋:na}} gi:hli wě:sa dluhgv̋:’i ù:lv́:sv̌:’i
fields.English: When the dog chased the cat‚ the cat climbed a tree.

fields.Text:
ᎣᏏ {{c1::ᏭᏏᏔᏓ‚}} ᎤᎴᏴᏒᎢ.
ó:si̋ {{c1::wű:sihtada}} ù:lê:yv:sv̌:’i
fields.English: When he placed his hand on the stove‚ he was burned.

fields.Text:
ᏓᏆᎴᎳ {{c1::ᎤᏗᏅᏔᎾ}} ᎩᏟ‚ ᎤᎵᏬᏨᎢ.
dagwalé:la {{c1::ù:dǐ:nv̂:tana}} gihli ù:li:hwó:jv̌:’i
fields.English: When a dog was run over by a car‚ it died.

fields.Text:
ᏁᎳᎩ ᎢᎬᏩᏛᏁᏗ {{c1::ᏰᎵᎠ‚}} ᎦᎶᏄᎮᏍᎪᎢ.
ne̋:lagi i:gv́wadv̋:nhdi {{c1::ye̋:li’a}} galo:nu:hě:sgó:’i
fields.English: Whenever he thinks he can get away with it‚ he cheats.

fields.Text:
ᎯᎸᏂᎴᎢᏍ {{c1::ᏥᏍᏓᏟᎸ?}}
hi:lv́:hnilé:’is {{c1::jisdahlilv̋:}}
fields.English: Did you beat him up when you two fought?

fields.Text:
ᏄᎳ! {{c1::ᏄᎾᏗᏅᏓᏊ}} ᎦᎵᏦᏕ ᏫᏂᎷᏨᎢ.
nű:la {{c1::nu:nádǐ:nv̋:dagwu}} galhjo:dé wì:ní:luhjv̌:’i
fields.English: Hurry! Let’s get there before he sells the house.

fields.Text:
ᎠᏓᏬᏍᏗ {{c1::ᎤᏚᎿ}} ᎤᏓᏅᏆᎡᎲ ᎠᎹ.
adawo:sdi̋: {{c1::ù:dű:hna}} ù:danhgwa’e:hv ama
fields.English: When he stepped into the swimming pool‚ he agitated the water.

fields.Text:
ᎠᏞᏌᏙ ᎠᏞᏌᏛᎢᏍᎪ ᎠᏓᏍᏓᏴᏗ {{c1::ᏱᏚᎸᏫᏍᏓᏁᎳ.}}
adlè:sadó à:dlé:sadv́sgó ada:sdàyhdi̋: {{c1::yidu:lv̌:hwísdà:ne̋:la}}
fields.English: She puts on an apron when she works in the kitchen.

fields.Text:
ᎤᎬᏫᏳᎯ {{c1::ᎤᏬᏂᏌ‚}} ᏚᏂᎳᏕᎸ ᏴᏫ ᏧᎾᎵᏍᏕᎸᏗᎢ.
u:gv:wiyu:hi {{c1::ù:wó:ni̋:sa}} dù:ní:lde:lv́ yv:wi ju:nalsde:hldi̋:’i
fields.English: When the chief spoke‚ he urged the people to work together.

fields.Text:
ᏧᎾᏓᏍᏚᏗ {{c1::ᎤᎵᏘᏌ}} ᎤᎿᏬ ᎤᏂᏯᏍᏔᏅᎢ.
ju:nda:sdù:di̋: {{c1::ù:lti̋:sa}} u:hnawó ù:ní:yà:stanv̌:’i
fields.English: He left his shirt when he escaped from jail.

fields.Text:
ᎤᎭᎸᎾ {{c1::ᎤᏃᏴᏟᏍᏔᎾ}} ᏓᏂᎳᏫᎬ ᎤᏓᎴᏅᎲᎢ.
u:halv:na {{c1::ù:no:hyv̋:tlistana}} dà:ni:lâ:wì:gv̋: ù:dale:nv:hv̌:’i
fields.English: When he rang the bell‚ church services started.

fields.Text:
{{c1::ᎤᏗᏞᎲᏌ}} ᎦᎵᏦᏕ ᏗᏜ‚ ᎠᎩᏄᎪᏨᎢ.
{{c1::u:di̋:hlehvsa}} galhjo:dé dí:dla à:ginu:gó:jv̌:’i
fields.English: When it got hot inside‚ I went out.

fields.Text:
ᏩᎦ ᎠᎩᎾ {{c1::ᎤᏍᏔᏓ}} ᏚᏅᏠᏢᎢ.
wahga agi̋:na {{c1::ù:slá’da}} dù:nv́:hlo:hlv̌:’i
fields.English: When he roped the calf‚ he tied up its legs.

fields.Text:
{{c1::ᎦᏓᏬᏍᎬ‚}} ᎠᎹ ᎤᏟᏨ ᏥᎴᏂ.
{{c1::gadawó:sgv̋:}} ama ù:dlî:jv́ jí’le̋:ni
fields.English: While I was swimming‚ water filled my ear.

fields.Text:
ᏑᏟᎶᏓ ᎢᏳᏓᏅᎯᏓ ᎤᏩᏌᏙᏴ ᏓᏆᎴᎳ {{c1::ᎩᎳ}} ᎤᏂᎩᏒᎢ.
su:hli:lő:da iyú:danv:hi̋:da uwa:sadô:hyv́ dagwalé:la {{c1::kilá}} ù:hnigî:sv̌:’i
fields.English: He pushed the car for a mile before it started.

fields.Text:
ᏄᏝᏂᎬᎬ ᎬᏗᏍᎪ {{c1::ᏳᏩᏌᏆᎴᏝ}} Ꮎ ᎤᏔᎾ ᎦᏆᏘᏗ.
nuhlanǐ:gv̂:gv̋ kdi:sgô: {{c1::yuwá:sagwale̋:hla}} ná ű:tana ga̋:gwatdi
fields.English: He uses all his strength when he rolls the big wheel.

fields.Text:
ᎦᏌᎾᎵ ᏓᏳᎴᏅᎲ ᎠᏓᏪᎳᎩᏍᎬ Ꮎ ᎦᎵᏦᏕ {{c1::ᏧᎪᏅᎢ.}}
ga:sana:lí dayu:lé:nv:hv́ à:dawě:lágì:sgv̋ ná gahljǒ:dé {{c1::jù:gohnv̋:’i}}
fields.English: The fire started at the roof when the house burned.

fields.Text:
ᎩᎶ ᎦᏒᏂᎬ {{c1::ᎤᏛᎦᎾ}} ᎩᏟ ᎤᏓᎾᏫᏍᏔᏅᎢ.
kilő: ga:svnhgv̋: {{c1::utvgana}} gihli ù:danâ:wstanv̌:’i
fields.English: When the dog heard someone whistling‚ he took off running.

fields.Text:
ᏏᏲ ᎠᏗᎭ ᎯᏲᏎᎸ {{c1::ᎯᎪᎥᎢ.}}
síyô: à:dǐ:ha hi:yò:sě:lv́ {{c1::hi:go’v̋:’i}}
fields.English: Tell him I said hello when you see him.

fields.Text:
{{c1::ᏯᏖᏃ}} ᎲᏃᏌᎲᎢ ᏂᏣᏂᎩᏓᏊ.
{{c1::hyahté:nő:}} hv:nó:sahv:’i nijǎ:hnígi̋:dagwu
fields.English: Sweep the floor before you go.

fields.Text:
ᎧᎾᏍᏕᏢᏗ ᎯᏃᏢ {{c1::ᎯᎷᏨᎢ.}}
kana:sde:hldi hì:nǒ:hlv́ {{c1::hi’luhjv̋:hi}}
fields.English: Bring a pick when you come.

fields.Text:
ᏅᏅᏓᎩ ᏩᏥ Ꮟ ᎠᎹᏱ {{c1::ᏫᏂᏣᏕᏘᏅᎾ.}}
hnv́nhdagi wǎ:ji sí amǎ:yi {{c1::winijadé:tinv̋:na}}
fields.English: Take your watch off before you dive into the water.

fields.Text:
ᎯᏍᏚᏅ ᏍᏚᏗ Ꮎ ᏩᎦ {{c1::ᎠᏂᎶᏐᎲᎢ.}}
hisdû:hnv sdù:di ná wahga {{c1::à:ni:lo:sohnv̋:’i}}
fields.English: Close the gate when the cows go by.

fields.Text:
ᎯᎯᏴᎢ Ꮎ ᏓᏆᎴᎳ {{c1::ᎢᎭᏂᎩᏒᎢ.}}
hihí:yv:’i á dagwalé:la {{c1::i:háhnígì:sv̋:’i}}
fields.English: Leave the car when you go back.

fields.Text:
ᏩᏥᎳ ᏴᎩᏍᎦ {{c1::ᎥᏗᏟᏒ‚}} ᏓᏓᏯᏪᎢᏍᏗᏍᎪᎢ.
wajî:la yv̋:kisga {{c1::v̀:tlí:sv̋:}} dà:da:yawê:sdi:sgó:’i
fields.English: If you swallow saliva while running‚ it tires you out.

fields.Text:
ᎭᎵᏍᏚᎳᏅ {{c1::ᎯᏄᎪᏨᎢ‚}} ᎤᏴᏜᎮᏃ ᏙᏱ.
halsdǔ:lâ:nv {{c1::hinu:gó:jv̋:’i}} u:hyv:dláhye:hnó dǒ:yî
fields.English: Put on a cap when you go out because it’s cold outside.

fields.Text:
ᎠᎹ ᎯᎩᏒ ᏗᎦᏚᎲ {{c1::ᏪᏙᎸᎢ.}}
á:ma higí:sv:’i diga:dú:hv̋: {{c1::hwě:dô:lv̋:’i}}
fields.English: Get some salt when you go to town.

fields.Text:
ᎯᏔᎳᏛ Ꮎ ᏥᏳ {{c1::ᎭᏑᏃᏅᎢ.}}
hihtalá’dv ná ji:yú {{c1::hasu:hnóhnv̋:’i}}
fields.English: Moor the boat when you’re through fishing.

fields.Text:
ᎦᏌᎴᏂ ᎭᎿᏬᎥ ᏙᏱ {{c1::ᎮᏒᎢ.}}
ga:salě:ni hahnawó:’v: dǒ:yi {{c1::he:sv̋:’i}}
fields.English: Put on a coat when you go outside.
